original_text: The apostles left the Sanhedrin, rejoicing because they had been counted worthy of suffering disgrace for the Name.
korean_text: 사도들은 그 이름을 위하여 능욕 받는 일에 합당한 자로 여기심을 기뻐하면서 공회 앞을 떠나니라

sentences.original_text: rejoicing because they had been counted worthy
of suffering disgrace for the Name
